Title: Mao Zedong Thought is the magic weapon to victoriously combat all enemies at home and abroad!
Publisher: Beijing United Printing Plant Revolutionary Rebels (北京联印厂革命造反队)
Notes: The small figures on the left, from the top down: Lyndon B. Johnson (约翰逊); Liu Shaoqi; Alexei Kosygin (柯西金); Deng Xiaoping; Chiang Kai-shek.The book is a volume of the "Selected Works of Mao Zedong" (Mao Zedong xuanji - 毛泽东选集).
